BEYAZ.IS.summary: Beyaz Filo Oto Kiralama A.S. provides fleet renting services in Turkey. It also engages in the automobile auction and retailing businesses; and maintaining the authorized dealership of Opel and Peugeot brands. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

UFUK.IS.long_name: UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S.
UFUK.IS.summary: UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S. invests in and finances small to large business projects in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Fon Sinai Yatirimlar A.S. and changed its name to UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S. in May 2016. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S. is a subsidiary of Yildiz Holding A.S.

VAKFN.IS.summary: Vakif Finansal Kiralama A.S., together with its subsidiary, Varkif Sigorta Aracilik Hizmetleri Limited Sirketi, provides financial leasing services in Turkey.
